Name: Twister
Effect: Target all foes in Range. Wind Move. Roll 2 Chance dice to Flinch those affected. If the Target is Out of Range due to using "Fly", "Bounce" or "Sky Drop" this Move hits anyways.
Description: A raging twister embedded with a dragonâ€™s fury. No one wants to be trapped in this fearsome spiral, which almost touches the sky.
